_header: God of heaven that sittest in throne
_description: An Exposition of the Pater Noster

BodDou141.First Lines:
God of Heuene þat syttest in troneAnd euer is prest to mannes
                    lone…
BodDou141.Last Lines:
…ffor loue of his moder dereAmen sygge we alle
                    yfere

CULDd1189.First Lines:
Godof hefne þat sittest in troneAnd euere is prest to mannes
                    lone…
CULDd1189.Last Lines:
…ffor loue of his moder dereAmen singge we all yfere
                    Amen
CULDd1189.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “A Sermon on the Lord’s Prayer.” 
             Journal of English and Germanic Philology
         15 (1916): 406-18.
